#summary Golf Markup Language Reference: complexType GolfBag.
#sidebar TOCSchema

== Name ==

[CGolfBag GolfBag]
===  Super Types ===
{{{
anyType
  |
  +--GolfBag (restriction)
}}}
    
----
  	
===  Documentation ===

        
			A golf bag can contain either golf clubs or references to them when they are
			in equipement-list elements.
		
----
      
  	
===  Properties ===

  	This component is not nillable.
----
  	
===  Model ===

	<...>
            ( uid`*`, name, bag-ref?, ( golf-club-ref | golf-club ){1,14} , equipment`*`   )
  </...>
----
  		
=== Nested Elements ===

|| *Name* || *Description* || *Type* ||
|| bag-ref ||  					Reference to the golf bag used for the round from the pieces of equipement.				 || golfml:REF_GolfBag ||
|| equipment ||  					Other piece of equipment used in bag: Balls, tees, apparel, gloves...				 || golfml:Equipment ||
|| golf-club ||  						Definition of a golf club owned by the player.					 || golfml:GolfClub ||
|| golf-club-ref ||  						Reference to a golf club in the player's equipment list.					 || golfml:REF_GolfClub ||
|| name ||  					Name of a golf bag used to identify it.				 || xs:string ||
|| uid ||  					Unique identifier for an application.				 || golfml:UID ||

----
  		
===  Local Usage ===
    	[CPlayer Player]
